item.title: ZeroMQ Socket Library v3.6.2.112
item.description:
Product: ZeroMQ Socket Library v3.6.2.112
Company: Martijn Jasperse
Release Date: Mon, 31 Jan 2022 13:39:49 -0500
Packager: Martijn Jasperse

Description: LabVIEW bindings for ZeroMQ, the communication library that provides simple many-many messaging and other topologies.

Release Notes: Now includes libzmq-4.3.2 with libsodium for CURVE support
item.dc:creator: Martijn Jasperse

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.11.1.15
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.11.1.15
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 31 Jan 2022 13:39:27 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.11.1.15]
- Updated to latest SMO (v1.4.0.69)
- Logger behavior changed (do not run process.vi unnecessarily)
- Logger.Error implements its own logging (remove MGI and hopefully zombie processes)
- Updated unit tests and misc. refactoring
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.3.6.11
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.3.6.11
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 27 Jan 2022 22:50:53 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.3.6]
- Updated to **LabVIEW 2019**
- Issue #43: Fix appending file extenion
- Issue #84: Fix handling of AWS credentials file
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

Description: VIs for controlling the Oxford VRM PS that controls the CF900's 3D magnet

Release Notes: [21.6.1]
- Update to Instrument Framework v1.11.1
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.11.1.14
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.11.1.14
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 16 Dec 2021 12:13:50 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Method for communicate with a piece of hardware (provides a hardware abstraction layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

The Instrument Framework makes extensive use of JKI State Machines and State Machine Objects.

Release Notes: [1.11.1]
- Reduce size of RPC and ZMQ methods and VIMs
- VIMs are now preallocated clones instead of shared clones
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LEIDEN TC v1.0.2.6
